resources.string: Low Pressure Alert! - %1$s.\n%2$s Tyre.\nPlease refill air at the nearest gas station. Save on precious fuel!
High Pressure Alert! - %1$s.\n%2$s Tyre.\nPlease slow down or stop your vehicle and avoid a tyre burst!
Ahoy! High Temperature Alert! - %1$s.\n%2$s Tyre.\nYour tyres are overheated. Take a break, cool down and avoid a tyre burst.
Shows a notification when a device is connected in background.
Shows notifications when new files has been saved.
Shows notifications when a proximity device got out of range.
SmartTyre Car & Bike is monitoring your tyres
